price: I spomeni u Knjizi Ismaila! On je ispunjavao dato obećanje i bio poslanik, vjerovjesnik,
arabic: وَٱذۡكُرۡ فِي ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ إِسۡمَٰعِيلَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ صَادِقَ ٱلۡوَعۡدِ وَكَانَ رَسُولٗا نَّبِيّٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-udh'kur fī al-kitābi is'māʿīla innahu kāna ṣādiqa al-waʿdi wakāna rasūlan nabiyyan
